column4: Question. I install Storage Device Manager on my desktop running Ubuntu 11.10, the program starts, asks for my password, once I enter that, I can see the icon and a settings icon in Unity Launcher, which then proceed to disapper and Storage Device Manager fails to load
jasonmchritos - I am very new to Ubuntu, what does that mean?
open a terminal from the acessories menu
run it from cli and look at any debug output
